bibl.title: "With a Pure Heart and a Truthful Tongue": The Recovery of the Text of the Manichaean Daily Prayers. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The text of the Manichaean daily prayers, as it can be recovered from a combination of sources (including papyri from Roman Egypt) remained remarkably constant as a fundamental pillar of the religious practice of this community deriving from Mani himself and an Aramaic original.
bibl.seg: Gardner Iain, "With a Pure Heart and a Truthful Tongue": The Recovery of the Text of the Manichaean Daily Prayers. Avec résumé en anglais.

The text of the Manichaean daily prayers, as it can be recovered from a combination of sources (including papyri from Roman Egypt) remained remarkably constant as a fundamental pillar of the religious practice of this community deriving from Mani himself and an Aramaic original.
